page.title: 02MARAZION
page.content:
MARAZION STANDS ON ONE OF THE OLDEST SETTLEMENT SITES IN THE COUNTRY.
DESPITE BEING THE ORIGINAL TRADING CENTRE FOR THE AREA IT HAS NOT GROWN NOR DECLINED OVER THE YEARS,AND IT IS NOW THE RESPONSIBILITY OF THE TOWN TRUST. THE TRUST WAS FORMED IN 1890 ON THE ORDERS OF THE CHARITY COMMISSIONER,TO TAKE CHARGE OF THE PROPERTY FORMERLY OWNED BY THE MARAZION.CORPORATION THE INCOME COMES FROM INVESTMENTS AND RENTS FOR THE HIRE OF THE TOWN HALL. THERE ARE NINE TRUSTEES,FIVE ARE ELECTED BY THE TOWN COUNCIL AND FOUR ARE CO-OPTED. THE ORIGINAL TOWN CHARTER WAS GIVEN BY QUEEN ELIZABETH 1 IN 1595 AND THIS IS STILL IN THE POSSESSION OF THE TOWN TRUST,AS WELL AS OTHER VERY OLD CHATTLES AND DOCUMENTS.
